name: Froggy & Frutti
description:
Play the game alone or with your friends

It's your choice how you will play that :D

Goal

Get to the door with second player who can be  controlled by only you or with your friend

Controls

 One player:

  • WASD - Moving
  • SPACE - jump
  • TAB - Change character
  • ESC - Menu/Pause
  • P - Add 2nd player
  • ENTER - choose

Two players:

1st player

  • WASD - Moving
  • SPACE - Jump
  • TAB - Change character
  • ESC - Menu/Pause
  • P - Add 2nd player
  • ENTER - Choose

2nd player

  • ARROW KEYS - Moving
  • NUM ENTER - Jump
  • BACKSPACE - Back to one player
  • ESC - Menu/Pause
  • ENTER - Choose
Download
  1. Unzip the file
  2. Run Platfrom2D 2p.exe
